{{% blocks/lead color="dark" %}}

Naftiko is built on an open core. This isn't limited to the technology we build upon, but also our market research, go-to-market, and revene strategy--building and evolving Naftiko out in the open across these areas, and communicating weekly via the Naftiko Manifest newsletter.

{{% /blocks/lead %}}

{{% blocks/lead color="white" %}}
